content: अवसन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Sunk down (<ab>fig.</ab> also), enervated, sinking, drooping; अतिप्रबलपिपासावसन्नानि <ls>K. 36</ls>; <ls>Śi. 15. 85</ls>; मदावसन्नहस्त <ls>Dk. 62</ls> powerless. {@--2@} Dispirited, sad, melancholy, unhappy; दधिकर्णोऽवसन्नो ब्रूते <ls>H. 2</ls> lean, weakened. {@--3@} Ended, terminated, gone off; अवसन्नतापमतमिस्रमभात् <ls>Śi. 9. 12</ls> devoid of heat; अवसन्नायां रात्रौ <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Unable to do one's duty. {@--5@} Lost, deprived of; पित्रोः सकाशमवसन्नदृशोर्निनाय <ls>R. 9. 77</ls> who had lost their sight. {@--6@} (In law) Non-suited, defeated.
